| File sharing license = Freeware website = Only on Freenet
}} is the name for a closed-source P2P application being developed in Japan by
an anonymous author. Since the author of [[Winny]] was arrested, Share was
developed as its successor, also focusing on higher security. Share functions in
much the same manner as Winny, using encrypted caches, file names and IP
addresses, and is based on the same node-organized architecture as Winny.
